reviews.content: Incredible views from our room! The hotel was located in a beautiful area and the scenery was breathtaking. However, the cleanliness of the room left something to be desired.
Absolutely terrible. The room smelled musty, the bed was uncomfortable, and the walls were paper-thin. Couldn't wait to check out.
Great value for the price. The room was clean and comfortable, and the staff was friendly and accommodating. Would definitely stay here again.
Overpriced for what you get. The room was small and outdated, and the amenities were lacking. Definitely not worth the cost.
Perfect for a quick business trip. The location was convenient, the room was clean and well-equipped, and the staff was efficient. Would recommend for anyone traveling for work.
Lovely boutique hotel with tons of charm. The room was cozy and beautifully decorated, and the complimentary breakfast was delicious. Will definitely be back!
Decent stay overall. The room was clean and comfortable, but the customer service was lacking. Had to wait a long time for assistance at the front desk.
Great family-friendly hotel. The room was spacious and clean, and the pool area was a hit with the kids. Would recommend for families vacationing in the area.
Not impressed. The room was small and cramped, and the bathroom was outdated. Definitely wouldn't stay here again.
Wonderful experience from start to finish. The staff went above and beyond to make our stay enjoyable, the room was immaculate, and the amenities were top-notch. Would highly recommend!
